entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11.
